sn17.3:4.4: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ udakarahade mahākummakulaṃ ciranivāsi ahosi.
sn17.3:4.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, aññataro kummo aññataraṃ kummaṃ etadavoca:
sn17.3:4.6: ‘mā kho tvaṃ, tāta kumma, etaṃ padesaṃ agamāsī’ti.
sn17.3:4.7: Agamāsi kho, bhikkhave, so kummo taṃ padesaṃ.
sn17.3:4.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so kummo yena so kummo tenupasaṅkami.
sn17.3:4.10: Addasā kho, bhikkhave, so kummo taṃ kummaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn17.3:4.12: ‘kacci tvaṃ, tāta kumma, na taṃ padesaṃ agamāsī’ti?
sn17.3:4.15: ‘Akkhato khomhi, tāta kumma, anupahato, atthi ca me idaṃ suttakaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhan’ti.
sn17.3:4.17: Etena hi te, tāta kumma, suttakena pitaro ca pitāmahā ca anayaṃ āpannā byasanaṃ āpannā.
sn17.3:4.18: Gaccha dāni tvaṃ, tāta kumma, na dāni tvaṃ amhākan’ti.
sn17.3:5.1: Luddoti kho, bhikkhave, mārassetaṃ pāpimato adhivacanaṃ.
sn17.3:5.4: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ assādeti nikāmeti—
sn17.3:5.5: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu giddho papatāya anayaṃ āpanno byasanaṃ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.
sn17.3:5.6: Evaṃ dāruṇo kho, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko … pe …
